hanzi-su-wiki:
姓

Значения

Фамилия, род, дом

Мнемоника

При матриархате новорождённый 生 получал имя матери 女. Позднее фамилия стала даваться по имени отца.
hanzi-su-slides:
姓

姓Как только женщина 女
рождает 生 ребёнка,
он получает фамилию.
xìngФамилия
«Какая фамилия у этого американского певца?»
«Синъатра!»
Некоторые люди скрывают свою фамилию
под псевдонимом (нисходящий 4-й тон).
purpleculture_pinyin:
xìng
family name; surname; Classifiers: 个 ; to be surnamed
фамилия; фамилия; Классификаторы: 个; называться
rtega_mnemonic:
姓姓RSone's family name, surname, clan
  • RS. the woman 女 we were born 生 from gives us our name
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 生 indicates the sound; 女 (woman) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
百姓 [ bǎi xìng ]: common people
老百姓 [ lǎo bǎi xìng ]: ordinary people; the "person in the street"; Classifiers: 个
姓名 [ xìng míng ]: surname and given name; full name
姓氏 [ xìng shì ]: family name
贵姓 [ guì xìng ]: what is your surname?; (May I ask) your surname?
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 女 [ nǚ ] woman, girl; female
    • 生 [ shēng ] life, lifetime; birth; growth
heisig_chinese_memo: When women marry, they adopt the surname of their husband, signifiying the start of a new life together. (adapted from gorgon).
heisig_constituent: surname, woman, life, This is Your Life, cell, drop, grow up
koohiiStory1: When women marry, they adopt the surname of their husband, signifiying the start of a new life together. (adapted from gorgon).
koohiiStory2: Woman change their surname when they "start their new life".
jp_example_words:
姓名(せいめい): full name
姓(せい): surname, family name
jp_readingExamples: 姓名 (せいめい), 改姓 (かいせい), 同姓 (どうせい)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: That special woman in your life will eventually take your surname and make it her family name too. Traditionally, a woman will change her last name when she gets married and keep that name for the rest of her life. Her husband’s family name becomes her family name too.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine having your surname changed for the rest of your life. How do you feel about having a different family name? Is it a big deal to you or does it not matter much?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Picture this special woman in your mind. She's changing her surname to yours and taking hold of your special saber (せい) as well. And it's... it's splitting in two!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Now you share a family name AND a holy blue saber! You can protect your legacy (and surname) hand in hand and saber in saber. (Or something like that.)
Ru_Notes: Не путать: 性 (さが、セイ、ショウ характер, род, природа).
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a woman's (女) life (生) has (several) surname(s)
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: When women marry, they adopt the surname of their husband, signifiying the start of a new life together. (adapted from gorgon).
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle starts from " female " and " sheng " also sounds. Bronze inscriptions do not follow " female " but " human ". The ancients gave birth to children and expanded their clan. The emperor gave the surname (Xu Shen, Xu Hao), "Zuo Zhuan. Implicit public eight years ":" emperor Jiande, because birth to surname. "Last name is derived from the blood relationship, innate, the title is a sign of human origin (Wang Fengyang), so as to from" raw "from " Female " or " person " means the last name. "Said Wen": "The surname is born by human beings. In ancient times, sacred, mothers feel the nature and give birth to sons, so they are called the emperor. From a woman to be born, you are born with a sound. "Chunqiu Chuan" says: The emperor gives birth to a surname. Xu Hao's "Shuowen Jiezi Annotation": "The original meaning of a surname is birth, so it is used for birth in ancient times. Later, because of birth, it was given a surname, so it became a surname."

The original meaning of " surname " is a title that marks the family system. According to Gu Yankui’s research, there were " surnames " and " clan " in ancient times. " Surname " is the family name, which can not be changed according to the matriline. " Clan " is a branch of " surname ", which can be independent and changeable. The clan who gave birth to the surname, the land of the (given)." After the Warring States, often with " s " to " surname ", " surname " and " s " then gradually mix a. The surname was originally produced in the matrilineal clan society. Each clan or tribe has its own surname. People with the same surname have a common female ancestor. Therefore, the ancient surnames mostly follow the female characters, such as: " Ji ", " Jiang ", " Yao " ", "妫", etc. Marriage of the same surname is not allowed. " Cherman " is a branch of " surname ". Since multiple men of the same surname are separated into surnames, the same surname can have different surnames to distinguish the birth of offspring.

The oracle bone inscription is used as the name of the person, "Compilation" 14027: "The surname gives birth to Qi Jia". " Ka " means good. If you give birth to a boy, you say Jia, and if you give birth to a daughter, you say no. In this oracle, the woman named surname gave birth and gave birth to a boy, so it was called Jia.

Bronze inscription means the family name, Qi Houping: "Protect my son (surname)", "Zi surname" refers to the descendants of the broad sense, that is, bless my descendants (Yang Shuda).

The characters on the bamboo slips and silk indicate the surnames, "people" and "wan surnames" refer to the people, common people, and people. "The Way of the Officials" Jane 51 II: "Loving all surnames". Also borrowed "眚" as " surname ", "Shangbo Bamboo Book I." Jian Yi" Jian 7: "Bai Zhu (surname)". "Mawangdui Silk Book. The 233rd line of Laozi's Second Edition: "Success is done, and the people's stomach (say): "I am natural"." It means that after the event is successful, the people say: We are like this, that is, it is natural (see Chen Gu Ying ).

The Chinese seal is used as the name of the person, and the "Chinese Seal Characters": "Liu Surname".
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle starts with " female " and " sheng " also sounds. The inscriptions from " people " and " birth " also sounded. In ancient times, the emperor gave birth to a family because of the birth of a son, and the emperor gave it a surname (Xu Shen, Xu Hao).
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「女」，「生」亦聲。金文不從「女」而從「人」，古人生子，擴大自己的氏族，天子賜以姓（許慎、徐灝），《左傳．隱公八年》：「天子建德，因生以賜姓。」姓氏是從血緣關係而得的，與生俱來，是人的血統的標志稱號（王鳳陽），故以從「生」從「女」或「人」，表示姓氏。《說文》：「姓，人所生也。古之神聖，母感天而生子，故稱天子。从女从生，生亦聲。《春秋傳》曰：天子因生以賜姓。」徐灝《說文解字注箋》：「姓之本義謂生，故古通作生，其後因生以賜姓，遂為姓氏字耳。」

　　「姓」的本義為標志家族系統的稱號。根據谷衍奎的研究，上古有「姓」又有「氏」，「姓」是族號，隨母系，不能改變；「氏」是「姓」的分支，可以自立，能改變，即所謂「因生以賜姓，胙（賜）之土而命之氏」。戰國以後，往往以「氏」為「姓」，「姓」與「氏」遂逐漸混一。姓最初產生於母系氏族社會，每一個氏族或部落都有自己的姓，同姓的人有共同的女性祖先，故古老的姓大多從女字旁，如：「姬」、「姜」、「姚」、「媯」等。同姓不得通婚。「氏」是「姓」的分支，出於同一姓的多個男子分出來另立為氏，故同一姓可以有不同的氏，用來區別子孫的所由出生。

　　甲骨文用作人名，《合集》14027：「姓娩其嘉」，「嘉」表示好，生男曰嘉，生女則曰不嘉。此條卜辭貞卜名叫姓的婦人分娩，產下男嬰，所以稱嘉。

　　金文表示族姓，齊侯鎛：「保吾子𠇷（姓）」，「子姓」指廣義之子孫，即保佑我的子孫（楊樹達）。

　　簡帛文字表示姓氏，「百姓」、「萬姓」指人民、庶民、民眾，《睡虎地秦簡．為吏之道》簡51貳：「慈愛萬姓」。又借「眚」為「姓」，《上博竹書一．緇衣》簡7：「百眚（姓）」。《馬王堆帛書．老子乙本》第233行：「成功遂事，而百姓胃（謂）：『我自然』。」意謂事情成功後，百姓都說：我們本來是這樣的，即自然如此（參陳鼓應）。

　　漢印用作人名，《漢印文字徵》：「劉姓」。
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「女」，「生」亦聲。金文從「人」，「生」亦聲，古時因生子開族，天子賜以姓（許慎、徐灝），本義是姓氏。

姓名(せいめい): full name
姓(せい): surname, family name

甲骨文從「 女 」，「 生 」亦聲。金文不從「 女 」而從「 人 」，古人生子，擴大自己的氏族，天子賜以姓（許慎、徐灝），《左傳．隱公八年》：「天子建德，因生以賜姓。」姓氏是從血緣關係而得的，與生俱來，是人的血統的標志稱號（王鳳陽），故以從「 生 」從「 女 」或「 人 」，表示姓氏。《說文》：「姓，人所生也。古之神聖，母感天而生子，故稱天子。从女从生，生亦聲。《春秋傳》曰：天子因生以賜姓。」徐灝《說文解字注箋》：「姓之本義謂生，故古通作生，其後因生以賜姓，遂為姓氏字耳。」 「 姓 」的本義為標志家族系統的稱號。根據谷衍奎的研究，上古有「 姓 」又有「 氏 」，「 姓 」是族號，隨母系，不能改變；「 氏 」是「 姓 」的分支，可以自立，能改變，即所謂「因生以賜姓，胙（賜）之土而命之氏」。戰國以後，往往以「 氏 」為「 姓 」，「 姓 」與「 氏 」遂逐漸混一。姓最初產生於母系氏族社會，每一個氏族或部落都有自己的姓，同姓的人有共同的女性祖先，故古老的姓大多從女字旁，如：「 姬 」、「 姜 」、「 姚 」、「 媯 」等。同姓不得通婚。「 氏 」是「 姓 」的分支，出於同一姓的多個男子分出來另立為氏，故同一姓可以有不同的氏，用來區別子孫的所由出生。 甲骨文用作人名，《合集》14027：「姓娩其嘉」，「 嘉 」表示好，生男曰嘉，生女則曰不嘉。此條卜辭貞卜名叫姓的婦人分娩，產下男嬰，所以稱嘉。 金文表示族姓，齊侯鎛：「保吾子𠇷（姓）」，「子姓」指廣義之子孫，即保佑我的子孫（楊樹達）。 簡帛文字表示姓氏，「百姓」、「萬姓」指人民、庶民、民眾，《睡虎地秦簡．為吏之道》簡51貳：「慈愛萬姓」。又借「 眚 」為「 姓 」，《上博竹書一．緇衣》簡7：「百眚（姓）」。《馬王堆帛書．老子乙本》第233行：「成功遂事，而百姓胃（謂）：『我自然』。」意謂事情成功後，百姓都說：我們本來是這樣的，即自然如此（參陳鼓應）。 漢印用作人名，《漢印文字徵》：「劉姓」。

姓字的基本解释

姓
xìng
表明家族的字：姓氏。姓名。贵姓（询问对方姓氏的敬辞）。
平民：万姓。老百姓。

姓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xìng］
［《廣韻》息正切，去勁，心。］
亦作“1”。
(1)标志家族系统的称号。
(2)指家族。
(3)子孙之通称。
(4)犹言命，性命。
(5)称呼；命名。
(6)姓。汉代有姓伟。见《汉书·食货志下》。

姓字的英文翻译

◎ 姓
surname, family name, clan name

姓字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　姓； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页259第05
〔古文〕??【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?息正切，音性。【說文】人所生也。【左傳·隱八年】天子建德因生以賜姓。　又孫謂之子姓。【詩·周南】振振公姓。【楚語】率其子姓，從其時享。　又晐姓，備庶媵也。【吳語】一介嫡女願執箕箒，以晐姓于王宮。　又百姓，民庶也。【書·堯典】平章百姓。又百官族姓。【酒誥】越百姓里居。　又生子曰姓。【左傳·昭四年】庚宗之婦人，獻以雉。問其姓，對曰：余子長矣，能奉雉而從我矣。　又姓。【前漢·食貨志】臨葘人姓偉，貲五千萬。【註】姓，姓也。偉，其名。　又推律定姓。京房本姓李，推律定姓爲京氏。　又筮易得姓，陸羽不知所生，自筮得蹇之漸，乃姓陸，名羽，字鴻漸。　又【集韻】師庚切，音生。人名。【春秋·哀四年】蔡殺其大夫公孫姓。　又叶桑經切，音星。【詩·唐風】豈無他人，不如我同姓。叶上菁。　【鄭曉曰】姓，字从女生。上古八大姓，姜姬嬀姒嬴姞姚妘，皆从女。?，从人。

考證：〔䀭姓，備庶媵也。【吳語】一介嫡女

Name meaning
Indicates the title of the family system.
姓
会意字。从女(像一位女子),从生(像植物初生),合起来表示女人所生。本义是姓氏,家族的名称。姓的产生和母系
社会有关。

xìng
1) фамилия; носить фамилию
你姓什么? как ваша фамилия?
姓王的 человек по фамилии Ван
2) род; происходить из рода
姓系 линия рода; родословная
3) состав семьи; дети, потомки
4) жизнь
5) называть; дать имя
6) Син (фамилия)
Radicals: 女, 生  (woman, life)
Meaning Mnemonic
That special woman in your life will eventually take your surname and make it her family name too. Traditionally, a woman will change her last name when she gets married and keep that name for the rest of her life. Her husband’s family name becomes her family name too.
Imagine having your surname changed for the rest of your life. How do you feel about having a different family name? Is it a big deal to you or does it not matter much?
Reading Mnemonic
Picture this special woman in your mind. She's changing her surname to yours and taking hold of your special saber (せい) as well. And it's... it's splitting in two!
Now you share a family name AND a holy blue saber! You can protect your legacy (and surname) hand in hand and saber in saber. (Or something like that.)
